entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 17. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then southwest 60 gusting to 90 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
